name: Lights Out (itch) (MattClem)
description:
[Left Arrow] - Left

[Right Arrow] - Right

[Up Arrow] - Jump

[Space] - Use Light

The lights have gone out, and with only enough light to quickly scan the room It's going to be hard to escape this place. 

The aim of the game is to reach the Red target in each level, you can only use the light once each life and only for a very short time.

No Sound in Game [Sorry Ran out of time!]
